title: The Mar-a-Lago Raid and the Jan 6 Bomber Cases Collapse (Ep 1831)
description:
In this episode, I address the shocking new developments in both the Mar a Lago raid scandal, and the mysterious January 6th bomber case. 

News Picks:

Jan 6 Pipe Bomber's Mechanical Timer Detonates Fedsurrection Lie.

Morale low inside LAPD's famed Robbery-Homicide Division as staff numbers slashed.

Horowitz: German insurance claims hint at millions of unreported vaccine injuries.


Illegal immigrants are staying in 400 dollar a night hotels in NY City? 

Health care workers fired over vaccine mandate awarded $10 million in settlement.

Rumble sets new record, 76% year-on-year growth in active users.


An explainer of the media’s role in the Spygate affair.
